CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting organizers can manage who can record and transcribe meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: We are expanding the existing ‘Who can record’ control for meeting organizers to include transcription. With this change, meeting organizers with eligible licenses will see a control called ‘Who can record and transcribe’ in the meeting options, which allows meeting organizers to select from three options: (1) organizers and co-organizers, (2) organizers, co-organizers, and presenters, or (3) No one. This way meeting organizers will be able to manage which roles can initiate recording and transcription for a meeting. This functionality will be available to Teams Premium and Copilot for M365 licensed users.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting organizers can manage who can record and transcribe meetings (Premium)
OldVersion.description: We are expanding the existing ‘Who can record’ control for meeting organizers to include transcription. With this change, meeting organizers with a Teams Premium license will see a control called ‘Who can record and transcribe’ in the meeting options, which allows meeting organizers to select from two options: (1) organizers and co-organizers, or (2) organizers, co-organizers, and presenters. This control allows meeting organizers to manage which roles are able to initiate recording and transcription for a meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Cloud IntelliFrame for Teams Meeting Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Cloud IntelliFrame makes non-AI cameras smarter.  With Cloud IntelliFrame, participants in the room appear similar to remote attendees, creating an immersive and engaging experience for everyone. Whether working from home or in the office, participants are able to see every facial expression and cue, just as if they were there in person. This feature is available only with the Microsoft Teams Rooms Pro license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Cloud IntelliFrame for Teams Meeting Rooms on Windows
OldVersion.description:
Cloud IntelliFrame makes non-AI cameras
smarter.  With Cloud IntelliFrame, participants in the room appear similar
to remote attendees, creating an immersive and engaging experience for
everyone. Whether working from home or in the office, participants are able to
see every facial expression and cue, just as if they were there in person. This
feature is available only with the Microsoft Teams Rooms Pro license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection - HR resignation date as a condition for risk level
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now select the HR resignation date as a condition to assign a minor, moderate, or elevated risk level. For example, an admin can configure the minor risk level to be assigned when an HR resignation date is sent via the HR connector. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Adaptive Protection - HR resignation date as a condition for risk level
OldVersion.description: Admins can now select the HR resignation date as a condition to assign a minor, moderate, or elevated risk level. For example, an admin can configure the minor risk level to be assigned when an HR resignation date is sent via the HR connector. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use a URL to reference supported files in Copilot in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Users can copy and paste a link of a supported file into the Draft with Copilot UI as a reference instead of searching for it in the file reference menu.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use a weblink to reference files in Copilot in Word
OldVersion.description: Users can copy and paste a link of a supported file into the Draft with Copilot UI as a reference instead of searching for it in the file reference menu.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use Draft with Copilot in Word based on text, list, or table selection
CurrentVersion.description: Use Draft with Copilot in Word with the on-canvas Copilot menu when a user selects text, a list, or a table. This generates new content from Copilot and provides a richer, more interactive experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use Draft with Copilot in Word based on text, list, or table selection
OldVersion.description: Use Draft with Copilot in Word with the on-canvas Copilot menu when a user selects text, a list, or a table. This generates new content from Copilot and provides a richer, more interactive experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use Draft with Copilot in Word based on text, list, or table selection
CurrentVersion.description: Use Draft with Copilot in Word with the on-canvas Copilot menu when a user selects text, a list, or a table. This generates new content from Copilot and provides a richer, more interactive experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use Draft with Copilot in Word based on text, list, or table selection
OldVersion.description: Use Draft with Copilot in Word with the on-canvas Copilot menu when a user selects text, a list, or a table. This generates new content from Copilot and provides a richer, more interactive experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Proximity Join via Ultrasound
CurrentVersion.description: With ultrasound for proximity join, users can more accurately discover and add the Teams Room they are in to their Teams meeting. The user's companion device detects ultrasound beacons emitted only within the physical Teams Room, providing a more accurate list of nearby room options on the pre-join meeting screen.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Proximity Join via Ultrasound
OldVersion.description: With ultrasound for proximity join, users can more accurately discover and add the Teams Room they are in to their Teams meeting. The user's companion device detects ultrasound beacons emitted only within the physical Teams Room, providing a more accurate list of nearby room options on the pre-join meeting screen.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ultrasound proximity join admin controls for Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: IT admins can use XML files to enable two proximity join settings for Teams Rooms on Windows: enabling ultrasound signals for a user to accurately find and choose a room to join a meeting from, and whether the Teams Rooms automatically accepts the ring from the user's laptop to join the meeting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Ultrasound proximity join admin controls for Teams Rooms on Windows
OldVersion.description: IT admins can use XML files to enable two proximity join settings for Teams Rooms on Windows: enabling ultrasound signals for a user to accurately find and choose a room to join a meeting from, and whether the Teams Rooms automatically accepts the ring from the user's laptop to join the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Ability to create custom tags in Communication Compliance policies
CurrentVersion.description: Communication Compliance introduces the ability to create custom tags to give Investigators the flexibility of using tags that fit their team/ organization's requirements. Leverage custom tags to leave more meaningful information for each policy match and to help other investigators understand the status of a message. Default tags will continue to be available for use.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Ability to create custom tags in Communication Compliance policies
OldVersion.description: Communication Compliance introduces the ability to create custom tags to give Investigators the flexibility of using tags that fit their team/ organization's requirements. Leverage custom tags to leave more meaningful information for each policy match and to help other investigators understand the status of a message. Default tags will continue to be available for use.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Video clip in channel
CurrentVersion.description: You can now use Teams video clip in channel, in addition to chat. Record yourself, your screen, or an audio-only clip and attach the video clip to your channel post or reply.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Video clip in channel
OldVersion.description: You can now use Teams video clip in channel, in addition to chat. Record yourself, your screen, or an audio-only clip and attach the video clip to your channel post or reply.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Connections Advanced Analytics
CurrentVersion.description: Enhancements to the current analytics module for Viva Connections will include the following: daily data for 90 days, user retention metrics, and monthly aggregates for the last 12 months.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Connections Advanced Analytics
OldVersion.description: Enhancements to the current analytics module for Viva Connections will include the following: daily data for 90 days, user retention metrics, and monthly aggregates for the last 12 months.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Annotate PDFs with Text
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows you to annotate and save PDF files with text boxes, when those files are stored in OneDrive and SharePoint. Users can access the annotation feature by opening the PDF in file viewer and selecting “edit”.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Annotate PDFs with Text
OldVersion.description: This feature allows you to annotate and save PDF files with text boxes, when those files are stored in OneDrive and SharePoint. Users can access the annotation feature by opening the PDF in file viewer and selecting “edit”.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie –  Integrating Apple's Push to Talk framework on iOS
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Walkie-Talkie on iOS will be integrated with Apple's Push-to-Talk (PTT) framework to enhance communication and convenience of transmitting audio from anywhere on their phone, even when Teams is not in the foreground. It enables audio transmission directly from the lock screen and comes with background runtime optimization for optimal performance while conserving battery life.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Walkie Talkie –  Integrating Apple's Push to Talk framework on iOS
OldVersion.description: Teams Walkie-Talkie on iOS will be integrated with Apple's Push-to-Talk (PTT) framework to enhance communication and convenience of transmitting audio from anywhere on their phone, even when Teams is not in the foreground. It enables audio transmission directly from the lock screen and comes with background runtime optimization for optimal performance while conserving battery life.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Introduction of secure workflow to bypass legal holds and retention policies
CurrentVersion.description: ,The first release of Priority cleanup enables admins to create a recurring exception to delete items under a broader retention policy and/or legal hold. Creating a Priority cleanup will require a separate security role, multiple approvers, and will have a complete audit trail. For example, you could reduce storage space by deleting meeting recordings, even when the OneDrive location has a longer retention policy. The feature also helps with scenarios such as data spillage cleanup and processing right to be forgotten requests.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting organizers can manage access to meeting artifacts such as meeting transcripts, recordings, AI-generated recap, and Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing a new meeting option that gives meeting organizers the flexibility to manage which attendees have access to meeting artifacts such as transcript, recording, AI-generated recap, and Copilot. Meeting organizers can select from three options: (1) People with existing access, (2) Organizers and Co-organizers, or (3) Specific People.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting organizers can manage access to meeting artifacts such as meeting transcripts, recordings, AI-generated recap, and Copilot
OldVersion.description: Introducing a new meeting option that gives meeting organizers the flexibility to manage which attendees have access to meeting artifacts such as transcript, recording, AI-generated recap, and Copilot. Meeting organizers can select from three options: (1) People with existing access, (2) Organizers and Co-organizers, or (3) Specific People.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Town halls in Government Community Cloud (GCC)
CurrentVersion.description: Set up and host large scale events across a GCC organization with the familiar Teams app you use for webinars and meetings using Town hall. Town hall capabilities include a new meeting template, capacity for up to 10k attendees, third-party eCDN support, green room, manage what attendees see, moderated Q&A, RTMP-in, live translated captions and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Town halls in Government Community Cloud (GCC) (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Set up and host large scale events across a GCC organization with the familiar Teams app you use for webinars and meetings using Town hall. Town hall capabilities include a new meeting template, capacity for up to 20k attendees, third-party eCDN support, green room, manage what attendees see, moderated Q&A, RTMP-in, live translated captions and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Rename general channel
CurrentVersion.description: In our efforts to bridge the gaps between general and other channels, introducing the ability to rename the general channel in your team. General channel in a team can be renamed by the team owner, or member (if they have permissions), to show up in the teams and channels list in alphabetical order.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Rename general channel
OldVersion.description: In our efforts to bridge the gaps between general and other channels, introducing the ability to rename the general channel in your team. General channel in a team can be renamed by the team owner, or member (if they have permissions), to show up in the teams and channels list in alphabetical order.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot Lab support for role-based prompts
CurrentVersion.description: Customers will be able to filter Microsoft-authored prompts in Copilot Lab to view those that are associated with a specific job role category, e.g., Marketing, HR, etc.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced incident communication with DLP email templates
CurrentVersion.description: You can now elevate your DLP incident management with the power of customizable email templates designed to send email messages to your stakeholders when an event is generated for DLP Policy match. With dynamic variables and tokens at your disposal, you can effortlessly create and maintain email templates, ensuring consistency and efficiency in your communications, along with a documented audit trail. You can use these email templates to inform end users about incidents, their severity, or the analyst's recommendations; stay on top of remediation efforts by sending follow-up notifications to end users with due dates; keep analysts informed about incident updates and assignments; trigger escalation notifications to managers or other custom targets; notify approvers of pending items with ease; and many more scenarios like these.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Protect your most sensitive content with double key encryption
CurrentVersion.description:
Double Key Encryption (DKE) provides organizations with a second encryption key for your most sensitive content.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/compliance/double-key-encryption

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Protect your most sensitive content with double key encryption
OldVersion.description:
Double Key Encryption (DKE) provides organizations with a second encryption key for your most sensitive content.
More info: https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/compliance/double-key-encryption
